plot_missing_summary() it plots missing summary

Source: R/plot_missing_summary.r
plot_missing_summary.Rd

plot_missing_summary() it plots missing summary

Usage

plot_missing_summary(missing_summary)

Source

https://www.r-bloggers.com/round-values-while-preserve-their-rounded-sum-in-r/ and http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32544646/round-vector-of-numerics-to-integer-while-preserving-their-sum

Arguments

missing_summary

a data frame generated with techr::missing_summary

Value

a plot generated with library(ggplot2) and library(waffle)

Examples


missing_summary(
data = scale_data,
scale_num = 1,
scale_info = items_data
) %>%
plot_missing_summary()
#> Error in missing_summary(data = scale_data, scale_num = 1, scale_info = items_data) %>%     plot_missing_summary(): could not find function "%>%"
